_metadata.description: Core P0 functionality for campaign-based file visit tracking with staleness scoring

requirements.title: Campaign Creation and Management
requirements.description: Create and manage campaigns with file glob patterns (*.go, *.js, etc.) to track files across different analysis projects

validation.notes: Tests validate campaign CRUD operations: TestCreateCampaignHandler, TestGetCampaignHandler, TestUpdateCampaignHandler, TestDeleteCampaignHandler, TestListCampaignsHandler, TestFindOrCreateCampaignHandler [REQ:VT-REQ-001]
Tests validate campaign storage and persistence: TestCampaignStorage, TestSaveCampaign, TestLoadCampaign, TestLoadAllCampaigns, TestDeleteCampaignFile [REQ:VT-REQ-001]
E2E workflow validates complete campaign lifecycle: create, verify, visit files, query, and delete [REQ:VT-REQ-001]

requirements.title: Visit Count Tracking
requirements.description: Track and increment visit count for each file in a campaign when agents analyze or review files

validation.notes: Tests validate visit tracking: TestVisitHandler, TestAdjustVisitHandler, TestVisitHandlerErrorPaths, TestAdjustVisitHandlerErrorPaths [REQ:VT-REQ-002]
E2E workflow validates visit recording and tracking through complete campaign lifecycle [REQ:VT-REQ-002]

requirements.title: Staleness Scoring Algorithm
requirements.description: Calculate staleness score based on visit frequency, last visit time, and file modification time to prioritize files needing attention

validation.notes: Tests validate staleness algorithm and prioritization: TestCalculateStalenessScore, TestUpdateStalenessScores, TestLeastVisitedHandler, TestMostStaleHandler [REQ:VT-REQ-003]
E2E workflow validates staleness queries (least-visited and most-stale prioritization) [REQ:VT-REQ-003]
E2E workflow validates staleness score calculation and prioritization logic [REQ:VT-REQ-003]

requirements.title: File Synchronization
requirements.description: Sync campaign files with filesystem using glob pattern matching to discover new files and remove deleted ones

validation.notes: Tests validate file sync: TestStructureSyncHandler, TestSyncCampaignFilesErrorPaths [REQ:VT-REQ-004]
E2E workflow validates file sync through structure/sync endpoint [REQ:VT-REQ-004]
E2E CLI workflow validates campaign file tracking and management [REQ:VT-REQ-004]

requirements.title: JSON File Persistence
requirements.description: Store campaign data and visit tracking in JSON files for portability and transparency

validation.notes: Tests validate JSON persistence: TestInitFileStorage, TestSaveCampaign, TestLoadCampaign, TestLoadAllCampaigns [REQ:VT-REQ-005]
E2E workflow implicitly validates JSON persistence across operations
